title: Agreements that Betrayed Sri Lanka: Interim Self-Governing Authority (ISGA)
content: – by Shenali Waduge – Ranil Wickremasinghe won parliamentary elections in December 2001 and within 2 months signed the ceasefire agreement placing a terrorist organization on par with a democratic government and virtually allowing the LTTE a carte blanche – an agreement like the Indo-Lanka Accord withheld from the People of Sri Lanka and…
